alert.note: Alert for Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:58PM EDT until June 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL PRINCE GEORGE AND NORTHWESTERN SURRY COUNTIES... At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burrowsville, or near Disputanta, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Cabin Point around 410 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Taylors Corner, Carsley, Spring Grove, Gwaltney Corner, Oak Hill Corner, Savedge and Barham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
